data.name: Lion Quest Infinity Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Go on a musical voyage with the Lion Quest Infinity soundtrack! Created by the band Falcon Ave., this collection of 15 songs spans everything between shimmering synth pop and smooth jazz. All packaged together into one album for you to sit back and relax to.
data.about_the_game: Go on a musical voyage with the Lion Quest Infinity soundtrack! Created by the band Falcon Ave., this collection of 15 songs spans everything between shimmering synth pop and smooth jazz. All packaged together into one album for you to sit back and relax to.
data.short_description: Go on a musical voyage with the Lion Quest Infinity soundtrack! Created by the band Falcon Ave., this collection of 15 songs spans everything between shimmering synth pop and smooth jazz.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
